*** Settings ***
Library  KwargsLibrary  arg2=value2  WITH NAME  NormalNamed
Library  KwargsLibrary  ${arg}  WITH NAME  NotNamedScalar
Library  KwargsLibrary  @{args}  WITH NAME  NotNamedList
Library  KwargsLibrary  arg2=${666}  WITH NAME  NonStringValue

*** Variables ***
${arg}   arg2=seppo
@{args}  ${arg}  arg1

*** Test Cases ***

Normal Named Arguments
    NormalNamed.Check Init Arguments  ${NONE}  value2

Named Argument Syntax Inside Variable
    NotNamedScalar.Check Init Arguments  arg2=seppo  ${NONE}
    NotNamedList.Check Init Arguments  arg2=seppo  arg1

Non String Value
    NonStringValue.Check Init Arguments  ${NONE}  ${666}
